channel.title: Dashboard on Online survey data analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboard on Online survey data analysis

item.title: Expand dashboard tiles to full-screen view!
item.description:
We’re excited to introduce a new way to interact with your data! You can now expand most dashboard tiles to full-screen size. The update empowers you to explore insights with greater clarity and make data-driven decisions more efficiently.

How does it work?

On any Crunch dashboard, locate a tile and open the menu. Click Expand to open the tile in full-screen view. Click the Analyze button to analyze the data in Crunch. Once you’re done, close the expanded view to return to your dashboard.

item.title: New graph customizations for dashboard display
item.description:
How it works

When editing a dashboard, you already have access to lots of great customizations via the existing tabs of the “Edit Tile” interface – Properties, Categories and Colors. For most visualization types, you’ll now find a fourth tab – Options.

The new Options tab

The contents of this tab will include most of the following options, though the actual set will vary depending on the visualization type you’re working with.
